architectural_resources: AWS Lambda functions: check_announcement, send_notification, send_telegram_notification (lambda/*/main.go; README.md)
Amazon DynamoDB table for announcement state (lambda/check_announcement/main.go; README.md)
Amazon SNS topic for fan-out notifications (lambda/send_notification/main.go; README.md)
AWS Systems Manager Parameter Store (SSM) for Telegram auth token and per-announcement channel config (internal/utils/ssm_parameter_store.go; lambda/send_telegram_notification/main.go; README.md)
Amazon EventBridge/CloudWatch Events scheduled rule to trigger check_announcement (README.md)
CloudWatch Logs log groups for Lambdas (implied by deploy/modules/lambda/README.md)
External integration: Telegram Bot API + Telegram channels (go.mod; lambda/send_telegram_notification/main.go; README.md)

deployment_relevant_files: .gitlab-ci.yml (Terraform init/validate/plan/apply stages reference deploy as TF_ROOT)
architectural_resources: - Lambda event source mapping from DynamoDB Streams (aws_lambda_event_source_mapping)
- SSM Parameters for Telegram auth token, chat id, channel name (aws_ssm_parameter.*)
- IAM roles/policies and CloudWatch Log Groups for Lambdas (deploy/modules/lambda/README.md)
